mapper.select: select product_id, product_encode, product_brand, product_type, product_businessmode, product_color, product_classify, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, remark1, remark2 from supplymarketing.gd_product where product_id = #{productId}

select product_id, product_encode, product_brand, product_type, product_businessmode, product_color, product_classify, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, remark1, remark2 from supplymarketing.gd_product limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select gp.*, gc.classify_name, gb.brand_name from supplymarketing.gd_brand gb, supplymarketing.gd_classify gc, supplymarketing.gd_product gp
gb.brand_id = gp.product_brand and gp.product_classify = gc.classify_id
and gp.product_brand like concat(concat('%',#{productBrand}),'%')
and gp.product_encode like concat(concat('%',#{productEncode}),'%')
and gp.product_type like concat(concat('%',#{productType}),'%')
and gp.product_color like concat(concat('%',#{productColor}),'%')
and gp.product_classify like concat(concat('%',#{productClassify}),'%')
mapper.insert: insert into supplymarketing.gd_product(product_encode, product_brand, product_type, product_businessmode, product_color, product_classify, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, remark1, remark2) values (#{productEncode}, #{productBrand}, #{productType}, #{productBusinessmode}, #{productColor}, #{productClassify}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remark1}, #{remark2})
mapper.update:
update supplymarketing.gd_product
product_encode = #{productEncode},
product_brand = #{productBrand},
product_type = #{productType},
product_businessmode = #{productBusinessmode},
product_color = #{productColor},
product_classify = #{productClassify},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_by = #{updateBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remark1 = #{remark1},
remark2 = #{remark2},
where product_id = #{productId}
